channel.title: Grunt on Preslav Rachev
channel.description: Recent content in Grunt on Preslav Rachev

item.title: Gulp vs Grunt. Why one? Why the Other?
item.description: So you’ve been trying to wrap your heads around and decide between Grunt and Gulp? Yeah, me too, been there, done that. In my case, the decision wasn’t really hard. I’ve never had strong feelings for Grunt, and for a long time, I used a custom made ANT script. I used to copy it over to every new project, and it helped me with basic tasks — moving, copying, cleaning, linting, minifying, etc.
